alert.note: Alert for Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert Slopes; Piute Walker Basin; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:42PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kern and southern Tulare Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 341 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Onyx, or 38 miles west of Ridgecrest, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Weldon, Onyx, South Lake Cdp, Kernville, Walker Pass and Riverkern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Kern River Valley; Mojave Desert Slopes; Piute Walker Basin; South End of the Upper Sierra
